cobblemon_quests.task.actions.tooltip: The actions the user must perform to complete the task.
cobblemon_quests.task.pokemons.tooltip: The possible Pokémon the user can interact with to complete the task. If the list is empty, any Pokémon counts for the task.
cobblemon_quests.task.shiny.tooltip: If the pokemon must be shiny to complete the task.
cobblemon_quests.task.genders.tooltip: The possible genders of the Pokémon.
cobblemon_quests.task.forms.tooltip: The possible forms of the Pokémon (Normal, Alolan, Galarian, etc.)
cobblemon_quests.task.pokemon_types.tool: The allowed types of the Pokémon (Fire, Water, Grass, etc.)
cobblemon_quests.task.regions.tooltip: The allowed regions of the Pokémon (Kanto, Johto, Hoenn, etc.)
cobblemon_quests.task.pokeballs.tooltip: The Poké Ball that the Pokémon in question has been or needs to be caught with.
cobblemon_quests.task.dimensions.tooltip: The dimensions the user must be in to complete the task. (Overworld, Nether, End)
cobblemon_quests.task.biomes.tooltip: The biomes the user must be in to complete the task.
cobblemon_quests.task.time_min.tooltip: The minimum time of day for the user to complete the task. (inclusive)
cobblemon_quests.task.time_max.tooltip: The maximum time of day for the user to complete the task. (non inclusive)
